desc: Glamour Secrets offers a wide range of womens nightwear lingerie and accessories. We specialise in sew in bra cups for wedding dresses and offer wholesale multi packs for bridal shops and seamstresses. We have a wide selction of quality ladies nightwear from popular beands such as Cottonreal and Cyberjammies.

layout.text: Quality Sew in Bra Cups perfrect for Wedding Dresses!
